          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction of magnesium and sulphuric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion des Magnesiums und der Schwefelsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de magnésium et d'acide sulfurique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do magnésio e do ácido sulfúrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di magnesio e di acido solforico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση του μαγνήσιου και του θειικού οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del magnesio y del ácido sulfúrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the formation of bubbles when magnesium is added to a dilute sulphuric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bubbles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dilute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphuric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung der 
Luftblasen, wenn Magnesium einer verdünnten Schwefelsäure 
hinzugefügt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formation des bulles 
quand du magnésium est ajouté à un acide sulfurique dilué.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a formação das bolhas 
quando o magnésio é adicionado a um ácido sulfúrico diluído.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formazione delle 
bolle quando il magnesio è aggiunto ad un acido solforico diluito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το σχηματισμό των 
φυσαλίδων πότε το μαγνήσιο προστίθεται σε ένα αραιό θειικό 
οξύ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la formación de 
burbujas cuando el magnesio se agrega a un ácido sulfúrico diluído.</string>
          </description>
